title: Marc Anthony Leave-In Conditioner Spray & Detangler, Grow Long Biotin - Anti-Frizz Deep Conditioner For Split Ends & Breakage - Vitamin E, Caffeine & Ginseng for Curly, Dry & Damaged Hair
description: Attain that luxurious and lovely style you've been looking for by using Marc Anthony Grow Long Conditioner. It infuses creamy, velvety moisture into extra dry, brittle hair to strengthen it and leave it healthier. Marc Anthony is infused with caffeine, ginseng and vitamin E to help lower the risk of breakage and dullness. The result is hair that grows longer that way that you want it.Consigue ese estilo lujoso y encantador que has estado buscando usando Marc Anthony Grow Long Conditioner.Paraben free
